original: @125a # // rgya gar skad du //
analyzed: @125a # // rgya gar skad du //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sva aa dhishth'a na kra ma /
analyzed: sva aa dhishth'a na kra ma /
translated: SvƒÅdhi·π£·π≠hƒÅnakrama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa /
analyzed: rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa /
translated: The Stage of Self-Consecration

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrasattva.üîΩBy teaching the special part of self-consecration, the emanation of the illusory self,

original: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i cha'i khyad par bstan pas sprul pa sgyu ma'i bdag / dpal ldan rdo rje sgeg mo nyid la lhag par rol pa'i ro gang ci yang rung //
analyzed: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i cha'i khyad par bstan pas sprul pa sgyu ma'i bdag / dpal ldan rdo rje sgeg mo nyid la lhag par rol pa'i ro gang ci yang rung //
translated: whatever bliss is enjoyed by the glorious Vajra LƒÅsyƒÅ herself,

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi dpal ldan gang la gang gis bstod pa de lta'ang 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin na //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi dpal ldan gang la gang gis bstod pa de lta'ang 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin na //
translated: if that is also praised by the glorious Vajram·πõta as having the nature of delusion,

original: ji ltar brjod pa 'di las gzhan su bcom ldan de la kun nas phyag 'tshal lo ;
analyzed: ji ltar brjod pa 'di las gzhan su bcom ldan de la kun nas phyag 'tshal lo ;
translated: then I pay homage to that BhagavƒÅn in every way, other than what is expressed here.

original: / gang yang mngon dga'i rgyal ba'i sku mdzes gcig pu nyid //
analyzed: / gang yang mngon dga'i rgyal ba'i sku mdzes gcig pu nyid //
translated: Whatever is the beautiful form of the victorious Ak·π£obhya alone,

original: su yang mkhas rnams snying gar gnyid sad mi 'gyur ba //
analyzed: su yang mkhas rnams snying gar gnyid sad mi 'gyur ba //
translated: no one awakens it in the heart of the wise.

original: gang zhig shar bas mnyam pa'i dus na dbang po dang // yul rnams bcas pa nub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gang zhig shar bas mnyam pa'i dus na dbang po dang // yul rnams bcas pa nub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to that which, when it arises, the senses and objects along with it disappear at the same time.

original: gang la spros pa dpal ldan bde ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje'i mtshon 'dzin cing //
analyzed: gang la spros pa dpal ldan bde ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje'i mtshon 'dzin cing //
translated: Who holds the vajra weapon, the nature of glorious bliss,

original: gang zhig cha byad spros bral dri med shes rab rang bzhin kun du 'gro //
analyzed: gang zhig cha byad spros bral dri med shes rab rang bzhin kun du 'gro //
translated: Who is the nature of stainless wisdom, free from the proliferation of characteristics, all-pervading,

original: dpag bsam lcug mas mngon mtshungs gnas gsum nyon mongs dra ba gcod pa gang //
analyzed: dpag bsam lcug mas mngon mtshungs gnas gsum nyon mongs dra ba gcod pa gang //
translated: Who cuts the net of afflictions in the three places, equal to the wish-fulfilling vine,

original: dpal ldan dro rje tshig mtshan btsun mo de la kun nas phyag 'tshal lo ;
analyzed: dpal ldan dro rje tshig mtshan btsun mo de la kun nas phyag 'tshal lo ;
translated: I pay homage to that glorious Vajra Queen from all sides.

original: / gang zhig rdo rje yan lag ma zhes kun nas dran pas kyang //
analyzed: / gang zhig rdo rje yan lag ma zhes kun nas dran pas kyang //
translated: Who is called Vajra-limbed, and is remembered on all sides,

original: nyon mongs bral ba'i bde ba 'ba' zhig sar ni bde 'gro ba //üîΩde la mi phyed gus pa'i khur gyi lcid kyis mgrin smad nas //
analyzed: nyon mongs bral ba'i bde ba 'ba' zhig sar ni bde 'gro ba // de la mi phyed gus pa'i khur gyi lcid kyis mgrin smad nas //
translated: Who is the sole abode of bliss free from afflictions,üîΩWith the weight of undivided devotion, I bow down

original: de yi zhabs kyi padma'i rdul la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de yi zhabs kyi padma'i rdul la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: To the dust of her lotus feet with the crown of my head.

original: gang gis bka' @125b drin zer gyis spros pa bdag gis de nyid ni //
analyzed: gang gis bka' @125b drin zer gyis spros pa bdag gis de nyid ni //
translated: By the light rays of her kindness, I have spread

original: rin chen 'od kyis bskor bas mun pa'i tshogs ni rab bcom zhing //
analyzed: rin chen 'od kyis bskor bas mun pa'i tshogs ni rab bcom zhing //
translated: The darkness of ignorance with the light of jewels,

original: rnyog med mig gis rang gi rnam par rol pa ring mthong ba'i //
analyzed: rnyog med mig gis rang gi rnam par rol pa ring mthong ba'i //
translated: I bow to the Guru Vairocana, who with his unclouded eye sees far,

original: bla ma rnam par snang byed de la yang dag 'dud //
analyzed: bla ma rnam par snang byed de la yang dag 'dud //
translated: and plays in his own form.

original: gang zhig srid pa dang ni zhi gnas 'gram du dga' ba rgyu mthun 'bab //
analyzed: gang zhig srid pa dang ni zhi gnas 'gram du dga' ba rgyu mthun 'bab //
translated: The river of the bliss of existence and of calm flows to the ocean of Nirvana,

original: ye shes nam mkha'i chu bos yid rgyas dpal ldan bla ma gsum pa nyid //
analyzed: ye shes nam mkha'i chu bos yid rgyas dpal ldan bla ma gsum pa nyid //
translated: and the third glorious Guru is the mind, which is filled with the water of the sky of knowledge.

original: dpal ldan rdo rje sgeg mo btsun mo'i tshogs rnams shes rab pha rol phyin rang bzhin //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje sgeg mo btsun mo'i tshogs rnams shes rab pha rol phyin rang bzhin //
translated: The glorious Vajra-Lalita, the queen of the assembly, is the essence of the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang zhig gnas gsum ston pa gcig pu dam pa'i dbang phyug dam pa'i sems la bdag skyabs mchi //üîΩgang gi sems ni mnyam pa nyid kyi yul du 'jog cing dug 'dra ba'i //
analyzed: gang zhig gnas gsum ston pa gcig pu dam pa'i dbang phyug dam pa'i sems la bdag skyabs mchi // gang gi sems ni mnyam pa nyid kyi yul du 'jog cing dug 'dra ba'i //
translated: I take refuge in the mind of the holy lord, the only teacher of the three worlds.üîΩThe mind, which is placed in the state of equality, is the elixir of transmutation of the poison of samsara,

original: 'khor ba bcud kyis len gyi rnam par mdzad pa rang dbang sngags 'dra ba //
analyzed: 'khor ba bcud kyis len gyi rnam par mdzad pa rang dbang sngags 'dra ba //
translated: which is like a spell.

original: gang gi sa ste dbang po'i blo yis min 'gro gsum khang chung gi //
analyzed: gang gi sa ste dbang po'i blo yis min 'gro gsum khang chung gi //
translated: The mind, which is not of the nature of the senses, is the house of the three worlds.

original: dri ma 'khrud nas gcig pu bla ma dam pa'i ngag la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dri ma 'khrud nas gcig pu bla ma dam pa'i ngag la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I bow to the speech of the holy guru, which alone purifies the stains.

original: gang gang dran par yang dag gnas pas snying ga padma'i mdud pa ni //
analyzed: gang gang dran par yang dag gnas pas snying ga padma'i mdud pa ni //
translated: By the right recollection of whatever is to be remembered, the knot of the lotus of the heart

original: dbugs 'byin grol bar sbyor ba'i bla ma'i bka' lung de nges ni //
analyzed: dbugs 'byin grol bar sbyor ba'i bla ma'i bka' lung de nges ni //
translated: is loosened by the application of the guru's instruction.

original: nyi phyed 'od 'dra'i tshogs kyis gnas gsum khang bu'i mun 'dzoms shing //
analyzed: nyi phyed 'od 'dra'i tshogs kyis gnas gsum khang bu'i mun 'dzoms shing //
translated: The darkness of the house of the three places is dispelled by the light of the sun at noon.

original: rmongs dang 'gal la bag ni du la bar bcad pas phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rmongs dang 'gal la bag ni du la bar bcad pas phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I bow to the one who has cut through the bonds of delusion and contradiction.

original: bla ma'i zhabs kyi rdul 'di cung zad dran pa yi //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhabs kyi rdul 'di cung zad dran pa yi //
translated: By the recollection of this small portion of the dust of the guru's feet,

original: yon tan spros pa yongs su gyur pas dpal ldan pa //
analyzed: yon tan spros pa yongs su gyur pas dpal ldan pa //
translated: the proliferation of good qualities is completely transformed into glory.

original: mi bde ba yi bdag nyid kyang ni mchog bde bar //
analyzed: mi bde ba yi bdag nyid kyang ni mchog bde bar //
translated: Even the one who has the nature of unhappiness has the highest happiness.

original: gal te grub na 'di las bsgrub bya gzhan med do //
analyzed: gal te grub na 'di las bsgrub bya gzhan med do //
translated: If accomplished, there is no other object of accomplishment than this.üîΩI am not tired by the multitude of arrows of various sufferings, such as old age, death,

original: bdag ni bla ma'i zhabs kyi rdul la gus dang ldan pas rga shi dang // nad dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs mda' 'dra'i zug rdu'i tshogs 'dis ngal ba med //
analyzed: bdag ni bla ma'i zhabs kyi rdul la gus dang ldan pas rga shi dang // nad dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs mda' 'dra'i zug rdu'i tshogs 'dis ngal ba med //
translated: and sickness, by the devotion to the dust of the guru's feet.

original: lus can rnams la ye shes bdud rtsi skal ba ma bgos mi nus pas //
analyzed: lus can rnams la ye shes bdud rtsi skal ba ma bgos mi nus pas //
translated: It is not possible for the nectar of wisdom to be unequally distributed to embodied beings.

original: gang zhig bdag gis spyad pa de ni yongs su gdung ba che //
analyzed: gang zhig bdag gis spyad pa de ni yongs su gdung ba che //
translated: Therefore, the enjoyment of it is a great torment for me.

original: blo yi yul min des na gang gi spyod yul min //
analyzed: blo yi yul min des na gang gi spyod yul min //
translated: It is not an object of the intellect, and therefore it is not an object of anyone.

original: gzhi yi gtam gyi rim pa bla mas gsungs pa ring //
analyzed: gzhi yi gtam gyi rim pa bla mas gsungs pa ring //
translated: The stages of the discourse on the ground were taught by the guru.

original: de yi rim pas snying rje la sogs yon tan dag / dad ldan rnams la snying gi gnas su rang nyid skye //
analyzed: de yi rim pas snying rje la sogs yon tan dag / dad ldan rnams la snying gi gnas su rang nyid skye //
translated: By that stage, compassion and so on arise in the heart of the faithful.üîΩAll of these things are one,

original: @126a * // dngos po 'di kun gcig pa dang // du ma'i rang bzhin cha bral te //
analyzed: @126a * // dngos po 'di kun gcig pa dang // du ma'i rang bzhin cha bral te //
translated: free from a nature of multiplicity, and partless.

original: 'di ni zhen pa'i sbyor bral bas //
analyzed: 'di ni zhen pa'i sbyor bral bas //
translated: This is free from the application of clinging.

original: rtsol ba'i rnal 'byor rnam par 'gyur //
analyzed: rtsol ba'i rnal 'byor rnam par 'gyur //
translated: The yoga of effort is transformed.

original: spu langs myu gu'i tshogs kyis rab dga' yi //
analyzed: spu langs myu gu'i tshogs kyis rab dga' yi //
translated: The assembly of sprouts of goosebumps is very joyful.

original: mchi mas mig gang rdzi ma bkrus nas su //
analyzed: mchi mas mig gang rdzi ma bkrus nas su //
translated: The eyes are filled with tears, and the eyelashes are wiped.

original: ches bstan gus pa'i khur gyis mgo 'dzin ni //
analyzed: ches bstan gus pa'i khur gyis mgo 'dzin ni //
translated: The head is bowed down with the burden of respect.

original: dpag bsam bla ma dam pa la 'dud do //
analyzed: dpag bsam bla ma dam pa la 'dud do //
translated: I bow to the supreme guru, the wish-fulfilling tree.

original: gsal bar spyi bor lag sngar cung zad byed //
analyzed: gsal bar spyi bor lag sngar cung zad byed //
translated: The hands are placed on the head, and a little is done.

original: rab dga' bcas pas nor 'dzin yan lag 'khyud //üîΩyang dag gus pa'i skud pas yid kyi me tog ni //
analyzed: rab dga' bcas pas nor 'dzin yan lag 'khyud // yang dag gus pa'i skud pas yid kyi me tog ni //
translated: The earth is embraced by the limbs of the one who is in the stage of Supreme Joy.üîΩAccept this garland of mine, which is strung with the flowers of the mind,üîΩWith the thread of perfect devotion.

original: mdud par brgyus pa'i bdag gi phreng ba 'di bzhes shig / mgon po khyod kyi bka' gnad nyung 'dus shes rab ni //
analyzed: mdud par brgyus pa'i bdag gi phreng ba 'di bzhes shig / mgon po khyod kyi bka' gnad nyung 'dus shes rab ni //
translated: O Protector, your words are few, but their meaning is profound,

original: rgyal po'i bu mo cha las mkhas 'dra dbang du byed //
analyzed: rgyal po'i bu mo cha las mkhas 'dra dbang du byed //
translated: Like the wisdom of a king‚Äôs daughter.

original: 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin rol pa'i ro yi bde ba ni //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin rol pa'i ro yi bde ba ni //
translated: The bliss of the taste of the play of the nature of beings

original: 'ba' zhig rjes su myong ba de ni yid gcig bsod nams can //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig rjes su myong ba de ni yid gcig bsod nams can //
translated: Is experienced only by the fortunate ones with a single mind.üîΩYou have taught a path that has never existed before,

original: lang tsho'i snying rjes brlan pas khyod kyis sngon med lam gsungs pa //
analyzed: lang tsho'i snying rjes brlan pas khyod kyis sngon med lam gsungs pa //
translated: Out of compassion for youth,üîΩSaying that beings have no place to go and nothing to go to.

original: 'gro ba bgrod bya med dang 'gro med ces bya ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: 'gro ba bgrod bya med dang 'gro med ces bya ngo mtshar che //
translated: How wondrous!

original: gang du gom pa bor ba tsam gyis mnyam med bde ba'i rgyun bcas pa //
analyzed: gang du gom pa bor ba tsam gyis mnyam med bde ba'i rgyun bcas pa //
translated: Wherever you place your foot, you create an incomparable stream of bliss.

original: gang tshe srid dang zhi ba cung zad tha dad ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: gang tshe srid dang zhi ba cung zad tha dad ma mthong ngo //
translated: When you do not see the slightest difference between existence and peace,

original: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal sa ra ha chen pos mdzad pa bdag byin gyis brlab pa grub pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal sa ra ha chen pos mdzad pa bdag byin gyis brlab pa grub pa rdzogs so /
translated: The accomplishment of self-consecration is complete.

original: // / pandi ta chen po pa sh'anta bha dra'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
analyzed: // / pandi ta chen po pa sh'anta bha dra'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
translated: The great pa·πá·∏çita ≈öƒÅntibhadra and the Tibetan translator Rma ban Ch√∂bar translated, edited, and finalized this.
